E001.description: The GitHub API token is invalid or has expired.
E001.solution: Check the GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable and ensure a valid token is set.

E002.description: The specified project '{{name}}' does not exist or you don't have access permissions.
E002.solution: Verify the project name and ensure you have the correct permissions.

E003.description: GitHub API rate limit has been reached. Reset time: {{reset}}
E003.solution: Wait until the rate limit resets or use a different token.

E101.description: The Claude API key is invalid or not configured.
E101.solution: Check the CLAUDE_API_KEY environment variable and ensure a valid API key is set.

E102.description: An error occurred during the Claude API request.
E102.solution: Check the error message and verify the API status and parameters.

E103.description: Exceeded the Claude API token limit ({{limit}} tokens). Usage: {{used}} tokens
E103.solution: Reduce the input size or use a model with a larger context window.

E201.description: The required configuration file does not exist.
E201.solution: Run 'poppo init' command to perform initial setup.

E202.description: The configuration file has invalid JSON format.
E202.solution: Fix the syntax errors in the configuration file.

E203.description: The configuration file is missing the required field '{{field}}'.
E203.solution: Add the required field to the configuration file.

E301.description: The file does not exist or you don't have read permissions.
E301.solution: Check the file path and permissions.

E302.description: You don't have write permissions or disk space is insufficient.
E302.solution: Check write permissions and available disk space.

E303.solution: Check permissions on the parent directory.

E401.description: Could not start the external process.
E401.solution: Ensure the command exists and has execute permissions.

E402.description: The process did not complete within {{timeout}} milliseconds.
E402.solution: Increase the timeout value or optimize the process.

E403.solution: Close unnecessary processes or add more memory.

E501.solution: Check network connection and firewall settings.

E502.solution: Check network speed or increase timeout value.

E601.solution: Enter a value in the correct format. Expected format: {{format}}

E602.description: The required parameter '{{param}}' was not specified.

E701.description: Could not start the agent process.
E701.solution: Check the agent configuration and logs.

E702.solution: Check the agent status and restart if necessary.

E901.description: An unexpected error occurred in the system.
E901.solution: Check the error logs and contact support if the problem persists.

E902.description: The requested feature is not yet implemented.
E902.solution: Use an alternative feature or wait for future updates.
